name: Steam Stonks
description:
STEAM STONKS

Produce steam and sell it for money. Compete on online leaderboards in this hectic first-person steam-farming game!

How to play:

  • Left Mouse Button to interact with objects in the environment
  • WASD to move around
  • Pick up canisters, fill up the water tank, and take your trusty shovel to the coal pile! Then sell your canister to the trader. Make too much steam though, and the canister will blow up!
  • There's a time limit, though! How high a score can you get in 15 minutes?

Made during Create Jam Fall 2022

busser: Programming, VFX & Voice of Trader

Soondun: Game Design, Animation & Voice of Host

LaurJam: Audio, UI & Voice of Player Character

Thaleia: 3D Modeling and Cheerleader!
